item.title: airpods
item.description: Apple AirPods are wildly successful. What lessons can we draw from a product that has infiltrated the ear canals of millions, with projections to reach tens of millions more?
item.dc:creator: Phil Liao

item.title: idea-to-product-hunt-launch
item.description:
Two weeks ago, I launched Emoji cp [http://emojicp.com/] on Product Hunt [https://www.producthunt.com/posts/emoji-cp].
It finished the day 13th out of 20 products with 67 upvotes.
Not bad for a 5 day project.
More importantly, I learned a couple things about Product Hunt and I wanted to share:
1. 60 Character Pitch 2. Voter Turnout 3. Be Consistent
60 Character Pitch The most important asset you'll need for Product Hunt is a tagline - your 60 character pitch.
Yes, the thumbnail can ste
item.dc:creator: Phil Liao

item.title: job-search
item.description: This is the story of my job search. I shed light on the entire process, from generating a list of companies, to getting offers and all the trials in between.
item.dc:creator: Phil Liao
